title: "Apple to halt US sales of Series 9
source_name: "Apple said on Monday it would pause sales of its Series 9 and Ultra 2 smartwatches in the United States from this week
date: as it deals with a patent dispute over the technology that enables the blood oxygen feature on the devices."

title: "Nvidia is the cheapest Big Tech stock despite 250% surge; Here's how"
text: "Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) has emerged as a dominant force in the 2023 stock market
source_name: riding the wave of the tech revolution led by artificial intelligence (AI)."

title: "1 Best Metaverse Stock to Buy in 2023 and Beyond"
text: "Meta Platforms' Reality Labs division is posting billions in operating losses each quarter. Mark Zuckerberg's strategic thinking for investing in the metaverse makes sense."
